overview:
Since 2004 Elliott King has been working as a Director of MintTwist Limited, developing Web Applications for numerous clients as a Project Manager and Technical expert.

Between 1996 and 2004 Elliott worked as an Oracle and Java consultant, mainly in the role of a DBA Developer and Systems Analyst at numerous blue chips around the world. These included Roche Pharma, RBS, Accenture and SwissLife Insurance in countries such as the USA, Denmark and Holland.
